scripts.watch:ts:default: nodemon -w src/index.ts --exec "yarn run build && cp dist/revert.js ../react/src/lib/build/revert-dev.js && cp dist/revert.js ../vue/src/lib/build/revert-dev.js"
scripts.watch:ts:win32: nodemon -w src/index.ts --exec "yarn run build && xcopy /s /y dist\revert.js ..\react\src\lib\build\revert-dev.js && echo F | xcopy /s /y dist\revert.js ..\vue\src\lib\build\revert-dev.js"
scripts.prebuild: tsc && babel src -d lib && browserify lib/index.js -o lib/bundle.js
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run pre-deploy
